item.title: reMarkable e-Ink Tablet Review
item.description: I’ve long fantasized about an e-Ink tablet: something I could use for writing, sketching, and reading.

item.title: Read: “Grok 1.0 Web Development”, by Carlos de la Guardia
item.description: A month and a half ago I posted a pre-review of `Grok 1.
